/circle6 Any oedema of the face, hands, abdominal wall and vulva is abnormal. Oedema can be 
suspected if a woman complains of abnormal tightening of any rings on her fi ngers. She 
must be referred immediately for further investigations. 
/circle6 If there is oedema in association with high blood pressure, heart disease, anaemia or 
proteinuria, the woman should be referred to the MO.
